summary: This is the sequel history of "Panda. Go, Panda. (1972)". The trio (the young girl orphan, a panda cub and his father) are joined by a tiger cub who has escaped from a circus.
cast: Kazuko Sugiyama|Kazuo Kumakura|Yûko Maruyama|Yoshiko Ohta|Yasuo Yamada|Brianne Brozey|Dana Craig|Alexis A. Edward|Katie Evans|Melissa Fahn|Barbara Goodson|Steve Kramer|Doug Lee|Dan Lorge|Sherry Lynn|Cody MacKenzie|Melanie MacQueen|Julie Maddalena|Mona Marshall|Simon Prescott|Kevin Seymour|John Snyder|Peter Spellos|Doug Stone|Kirk Thornton|Ayao Wada|Claude Wayne|Heidi Wilbur
title: Panda kopanda amefuri sâkasu no maki
